story-moment.RACE FOR THE ORB: Yondu’s discovery that Peter Quill, who he had raised, had beaten him to a valuable orb which pitted the two against each other.
story-moment.YONDU VS. SOLDIERS: Shot down during the battle against Ronan’s forces, Yondu showed just how dangerous he was when he used his arrow to take out a group of Sakaaran soldiers who tried to subdue him.
story-moment.REMINDER OF HIS PAST: An unplanned reunion with Stakar Ogord uncomfortably reminded Yondu of his past and how he came to be ostracized.
story-moment.MUTINY: After a mutiny against him, Yondu, joined by Rocket and Groot, struck back at the Ravagers who had betrayed him.
story-moment.HERO: Yondu used his final moments to save Peter Quill’s life, acknowledging that he cared for Peter as though Peter were his own son.

powers+abilities.CYBERNETIC FIN: Yondu’s arrow is controlled by a cybernetic fin connected to his head. Though Nebula destroyed his initial fin, he replaced it with a larger prototype version.
powers+abilities.SKILLED PILOT: Yondu is a skilled pilot, which came in handy when he found himself at odds with various interstellar forces.
